full_threads.body:
Hi Katy, 

Thanks, confirming the images have been updated and "contact" added to the main nav. You can see the changes here: https://www.totalphysiomv.com/home-v2/

Please let us know of any further changes. Once approved, we'll get the updates live.
(Time: 45mins)
@joel, we have received the images from the client. There is also a request to add the contact button to the header.

Hi Chris

I have put all the images in the dropbox folder this morning. Can you add the 'Contact' to the main menu at the end?

Thanks
Katy

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Katy, 

Thanks, can you please add the image files to the following Dropbox: https://www.dropbox.com/request/GaWI4uCi8MjkVNBEgB2Q

We have prepared the draft page for your review (pending images of course): https://www.totalphysiomv.com/home-v2/
Please note that it is password protected: totalphysiomv 

There were some minor design elements we tweaked, the most notable are:
1. Headings from Blogs and Newsletter are contained within the same element/colour background. 
2. The newsletter subscription fields follow the styling that is set throughout the website. 

Please also let us know where you would like the "Contact" menu item to be positioned.

@chris Thanks for that.

(Time: 210mins)


https://www.totalphysiomv.com/home-v2/

Hi Maruska,

We are working on the new homepage, can you send us the images for the new homepage and the canva file as well?

Hi @joel, I quoted the client 4 hours and Friday COB. Are you ok to get started on this?

If possible, let's use a draft page that is available to non-logged in users to keep things simple for the client.

Hi Chris

Thanks, this all looks good, please proceed.

Kind regards,
Maruska

Hi Maruska,

I hope you had a great weekend. 

We expect the requested changes to take approximately 4 hours. Additional developer support is billed at $109/hour including GST. 
With your prompt approval, we expect to complete the updates by Thursday or Friday this week. 

Please let me know if we have approval to get started.
@chris Sure, 2-4hrs should be fine.
Hi @joel, can you please let me know how long you would need to complete the below? I'll let the client know before we started. Thanks!
@chris the customer is asking about the pproximate timing / costings of thenew homepage layout.

Hi Chris,

As mentioned, please find attached the brief for a new home page layout for your website.

Please have a look at let me know approximate timing / costings and if you have any questions.

Thank you and enjoy the long weekend!

Kind regards,

Maruska
